      j - variable to store j coordinate of cell
      direct - variable to store direction of movement
      Returns:

    • isValidDesH

      private boolean isValidDesH(int i, int j, int des, int sign)
      Method to check if conditions for adding tiles Horizontally are true
      Parameters:
      i - variable to store i coordinate of cell
      j - variable to store j coordinate of cell
      des - variable to store destination coordinate of cell
      sign - variable to check direction of movement
      Returns:
      returns true if conditions for adding tiles is true, false otherwise

    • game

      void game(javafx.scene.Scene gameScene, javafx.scene.Group root, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.Scene endGameScene, javafx.scene.Group endGameRoot, String username, boolean darkMode, int gridSize)
      Driving method to run the game scene
      Parameters:
      gameScene - Scene to store elements in the game screen
      primaryStage - main stage used for the game
      endGameScene - Scene to store elements in the end game screen
      username - variable to store username
      darkMode - boolean to check if dark mode is enabled
      gridSize - variable to check selected grid size
